document.masterDocTitle: A sea of worms: polychaete checklist of the Adriatic Sea

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A sea of worms: polychaete checklist of the Adriatic Sea

subSubSection.paragraph:
LITERATURE
RECORDS
:
Crema et al . 1993
, 2001 ;
Castelli et al . 2008
.
NEW
RECORDS
: BM 97 , BM 98 , BM 99 .

REMARKS : Alien species originating from the Indian Ocean (south African coast) and Red Sea (
Day 1967
;
Zenetos et al. 2010
). Recorded for the first time in the western Mediterranean (Marseille) and eastern Mediterranean (Crete Island) by
Harmelin ( 1968 )
.

NEW
RECORDS
: BM 11 , BM 12 , BM 13 , BM 14 , BM 15 , BM 16 , BM 17 , BM 18 , BM 19 , BM 20 , BM 21 , BM 22 , BM 25 , BM 26 , BM 27 , BM 28 , BM 30 , BM 33 , BM 34 , BM 37 , BM 38 , BM 39 , BM 40 , BM 41 , BM 42 , BM 43 , BM 44 , BM 45 , BM 46 , BM 47 , BM 48 , BM 49 , BM 50 , BM 51 , BM 52 , BM 53 , BM 54 , BM 65 , BM 66 , BM 69 , BM 68 , BM 71 , BM 73 , BM 91 , BM 92 , BM 96 , BM 99 .

LITERATURE
RECORDS
:
Aleffi et al . 2003
;
Castelli et al . 2008
.
